title: EU Customs Calculator 2026 - Duty & Handling Surcharge Impact Analysis
pageSubtitle: Discover how the new EU customs regulations and handling surcharges impacts your import business.
importCountryHint: Select the EU member state where goods are cleared for Customs
orderValueHint: Enter the average value of your order in EUR
packageCountHint: How many packages in this order?
hsCodeCountHint: How many different product categories (HS codes) in this order?
handlingSurchargeCountriesNote: Handling surcharge currently applies only when goods are cleared in Italy and Romania. France will implement a surcharge from March 1, 2026.
fillForm: Fill in the form on the left to calculate the impact of EU 2026 customs regulations on your shipments
